shoes.name: Nike Air Max 270
shoes.description: Nike Air Max 270 features a large Air Max unit for exceptional cushioning and comfort. Ideal for casual wear and sports activities.

shoes.name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 39
shoes.description: A versatile running shoe designed for comfort, featuring responsive cushioning and a breathable upper for all-day wear.

shoes.name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly NEXT% 2
shoes.description: Designed for speed, this shoe is ideal for elite runners. The ZoomX foam provides incredible energy return and responsiveness.

shoes.name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit
shoes.description: The React Infinity Run Flyknit offers unmatched cushioning, giving you a soft, smooth ride that reduces injury risk while running.

shoes.name: Nike Air Force 1 Low
shoes.description: A classic silhouette with a leather upper and the iconic Air Force 1 cushioning. A stylish, all-time favorite for streetwear enthusiasts.

shoes.name: Nike Free RN 5.0
shoes.description: Designed for natural movement, the Nike Free RN 5.0 offers a flexible and lightweight feel, making it perfect for short runs or casual wear.

shoes.name: Nike Air Max 90
shoes.description: With retro vibes and iconic comfort, the Air Max 90 delivers reliable cushioning and a timeless design.

shoes.name: Nike Air Zoom Structure 25
shoes.description: Support and stability come together in the Nike Air Zoom Structure 25, designed to keep you stable and secure during your runs.

shoes.name: Nike SB Dunk Low
shoes.description: A skate-inspired shoe with excellent durability and style. The Nike SB Dunk Low is a perfect mix of function and fashion.

shoes.name: Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage
shoes.description: This retro-inspired basketball sneaker offers a leather upper and durable rubber outsole, making it a versatile choice for all-day wear.

dresses.name: Nike Pro Women's Tank
dresses.description: A performance tank designed for comfort, offering a lightweight, breathable fit for training or casual wear.

dresses.name: Nike Dri-FIT One Women's Tank
dresses.description: Made with Dri-FIT technology to wick away sweat, this tank top is ideal for keeping you cool during intense workouts.

dresses.name: Nike Sportswear Heritage Women's Hoodie
dresses.description: Soft and cozy, this hoodie is perfect for cooler weather and casual outings, offering a relaxed fit and a stylish design.

dresses.name: Nike Air Max Dress
dresses.description: A blend of casual style and comfort, the Nike Air Max Dress is designed with a soft fabric and sleek silhouette.

dresses.name: Nike Dri-FIT Racerback Women's Tank
dresses.description: This lightweight tank is perfect for both workouts and everyday wear, with sweat-wicking Dri-FIT technology for extra comfort.

dresses.description: A classic T-shirt for everyday wear, designed with a soft cotton blend and the signature Nike logo on the chest.

dresses.name: Nike Tech Fleece Women's Joggers
dresses.description: Nike's Tech Fleece joggers offer a lightweight, warm feel, ideal for layering on chilly days while keeping a modern look.

dresses.name: Nike Dri-FIT Women's Running Shorts
dresses.description: Perfect for runners, these Dri-FIT shorts offer comfort, breathability, and moisture-wicking properties.

dresses.name: Nike Training Women's Jacket
dresses.description: A versatile jacket designed for training, offering warmth and comfort with a stylish design.

dresses.name: Nike Sportswear Classic Women's Joggers
dresses.description: These joggers are designed for ultimate comfort, with a classic cut and a stylish look perfect for casual wear.
